newsentry.title: MyCoRe Workshop
newsentry.message: The MyCoRe User Workshop 2016 will take place in Leipzig! Workshop: 9. Nov. 2016, Hands-on-Workshop: 10. Nov.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: LTS-Release 2016.06
newsentry.message: Since 27. May 2016 our LongTermSupport release for 2016 is available.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Update
newsentry.message: MIR and Skeleton are using current LTS version 2016.06.0.1
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: The "Epigraphische Datenbank" is now - based on Skeleton - at the "Universität Hamburg" online.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen
